CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: It is well - known that balanced electron and hole mobility of the active layer is required for high performance polymer solar cells.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| polymer |
| active layer |

(Note: "polymer" is mentioned in the context of solar cells, and "active layer" refers to the layer in a solar cell where charge carriers are generated, so both are considered material names in this context.)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| active layer |

(Note: In this revised table, I have removed "polymer" since it is not explicitly mentioned as a material name in the paragraph. Instead, it is mentioned in the context of solar cells, but without clear reference to a specific material. "Active layer" is the only clear material name in the paragraph.)
